Hello and Welcome to my Portfolio!! Here is a quick intro about me!

  • Looking for full-time job opportunities in Software Engineering roles starting immediately.

Thank you for visiting my portfolio. I invite you to explore my professional work, delve into my projects, and reach out to discuss potential collaborations or insights into the fascinating world of software development.

Testimonials

“We have been very thankful to have Rupal Jain working with us over the summer as a Software Engineer. She’s played a very important role in the development of a web, cloud, and container-based SaaS platform. Rupal is a dedicated, driven, and creative problem solver. She takes direction very well, without requiring micromanagement. Wherever she needs to pick up a new skill to fulfil a task, she’s happy and willing to do so. She is also a joy to work with and a great team player. Rupal will be an asset to any team, and I’m glad to recommend her.” 

Damilare D. Fagbemi
CEO

“Ms. Jain helped us take a javascript app from "works in a test environment" to cloud, AWS lambda production. Thank you so very much. There were coding issues, language issues, configuration changes, container images to sort. Many problems to solve getting the app to run properly and reliably. Importantly, Ms. Jain demonstrates incredible perseverance, often in the face of opaque challenges requiring dedicated and focused research and experimental patience. I can wholeheartedly endorse Ms. Jain to any organization that needs someone motivated to deliver, where delivery is contingent upon surmounting challenges and discovering solutions. Plus, she is a delight to work with, highly professional and personable.”

Brook Schoenfield
